name: Atom by Zachary Wormleighton
short_description:
ATOM
by Zachary Wormleighton

Story: The game pitts you, the player, in a futile battle against a host of angry ions. You are the almighty atom with 111 electrons - but, you're extremely unstable. You must fire electrons at the enemy to destroy the Helium-2 atoms and steal their electrons trying to survive in the nuclear prison you're in.
Objective: You must try and survive as long as you can in the arena-area and rack up as many points as possible. You will be given collectable upgrades throughout the gameplay and will encounter a number of enemies that spawn, trying to reduce you to mear sub-atomic particles in a thermo-nuclear fission that will blow your mind!
Enjoy!
Controls:
W - To move upwards
S - To move downwards
A - To move to the left
D - To move to the right
P - To pause the game
Mouse - To aim
Left Mouse Button - To fire
Esc - To exit the game
(Also, you can use F9 to take a screenshot of the game.)
WARNING: ATOMS NOT TO SCALE.
summary: A small, extremely addictive, arcade-style game.
